# golor

## Description
golor is command line program which colorize text written in Go.

## Installation
WIP

## Usage


## Option

``` sh
  -c string
        string color (shorthand) (default "red")
  -color string
        string color (default "red")
  -t string
        target string (shorthand)
  -target string
        target string
```
